title: HOUR 1- Reggie Miller 081320
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Reggie Miller 081320
description:
Reggie Miller tells Dan that he is still riding with Portland. Reggie says he feel strongly about the Lakers, but says don't mess with Damian Lillard because he is playing on a different world.
